entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 5:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure: 103.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 35 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -19.3°C
Wind: SE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
